manifest.name: #-Guardians of the Ralaxy
manifest.tag-line: Guarding the rift to save Gamora for that gussy
manifest.description: GPU plugin render distance = 40 Camera plugin zoom out = 150 ****Options**** Chisel in inventory = Assembly of guardians for extra points / Low chance Rune pouch in inventory = Disable collecting cells to make runes slightly faster *************** Scans RC lvl and quests done for 4 types of catalytic runes Default = [Blood, Death, Law, Nature] No Quests = [Nature, Chaos, Body, Mind] To override have 4 catalytic runes and start bot Implementation of combination runes is possible for the future MISSING COORDINATES FOR BLOOD DEATH COSMIC
